name: the-quarrymen
description: Next.js + Sanity: A Powerful Website Starter with Real-time Visual Editing

scripts.build: studio/sanity.config.sh dynamic && cd studio && sanity build --no-extract-manifest
scripts.deploy: studio/sanity.config.sh dynamic && cd studio && sanity deploy --no-build
scripts.import-sample-data: cd studio && sanity dataset import sample-data.tar.gz --replace
scripts.manifest: studio/sanity.config.sh static && cd studio && sanity manifest extract
scripts.typegen: studio/sanity.config.sh static && sanity schema extract && sanity typegen generate
